title: I need Help
body:
Im on a losing streak of roughly 20 games. What do i do in this situation. 

(These games have all been played throughout roughly a month or so)

replies.body: Stop playing random champions every game and stick to 1 or 2 champs so you learn how they work, their power spikes and their matchups better. You will find it easier to win games, when you don't have to use any brain power on how to get your champion to work properly.
Play some ARAM and go 50/50 on W/L. It'll at least break the mentality of the slump.

You're not playing enough ranked games within a short period of time. You need to learn a role, build a champion pool, and stick to it. Then you'll learn and improve and start to win games. You might demote a lot at first but it'll be better for you in the long run.
